definition[0]: a short tube of thick cloth or fur that you can put your hands into to keep them warm in cold weather
definition[1]: to spoil a chance to do something well or achieve something
example[0]: You’ll probably only get one chance to take a photo, so don’t muff it!
definition[2]: to fail to catch a ball or kick it properly in a game or sport
example[1]: With only the goalkeeper to beat, he completely muffed his shot.
